name: The United States Party for Reason
body:
### Welcome to the Homepage of the United States Party for Reason.

We believe in a new kind of politics where one's party shouldn't dictate your stance. Politics is about people, and even though it doesn't always seem like it, politicians are people too. The feel differently about different issues, and we aim to be the first party that is compatible with wide arrays of beliefs. We are currently building and finalizing the website, please follow us on twitter for the latest info.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
